Package fr.cyu.chromatynk.draw

Class TangibleCursor

java.lang.Object
fr.cyu.chromatynk.draw.TangibleCursor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cursor
public class TangibleCursor extends Object implements Cursor
A tangible/real cursor.

  • Constructor Details

    • TangibleCursor

      public TangibleCursor(double x, double y, double dirX, double dirY, boolean visible, Color color, double opacity, double thickness)
      Create a new tangible cursor.
      Parameters:
      x - the X coordinate of this cursor
      y - the Y coordinate of this cursor
      dirX - the X direction of this cursor
      dirY - the Y direction of this cursor
      visible - the visibility of this cursor
      color - the color to use when drawing with this cursor
      opacity - the opacity to use when drawing with this cursor
      thickness - the thickness to use when drawing with this cursor

    • TangibleCursor

      Create a new tangible cursor with default values.
      Parameters:
      x - the X coordinate of this cursor
      y - the Y coordinate of this cursor
